name: cially
description: Cially is a self-hosted privacy-focused image board with modern features like real-time posts, custom themes, tagging, and moderation tools. Designed for communities wanting a lightweight and secure alternative to mainstream image boards.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Privacy-focused community image board. Secure sharing

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Personalize appearance with themes. Branded experience

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize content with flexible tags. Easy discovery

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Modern alternative to mainstream boards. Better performance

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your community. Data sovereignty
